Building the Future of MoneyJoin Bitcoin Unlimited in Tokyo for a premier conference and event.

Following Satoshi’s Vision conference held in San Francisco in 2016, and the Bitcoin Unlimited sponsored “The Future of Bitcoin” Conference held in Arnhem 2017, Bitcoin Unlimited brings you another premier event. Satoshi’s Vision Conference Tokyo will bring together developers, researchers, businesses, and Bitcoin Cash and other cryptocurrency enthusiasts from around the world.

Tickets Early Bird Tickets Sold Out, Regular Price Tickets Still Available

Tickets are only $400 for three full days of talks by inspiring and knowledgeable speakers, three lunches, and a banquet dinner on the Saturday evening. An amazing deal for an amazing conference. Come join the luminaries, enthusiasts, researchers, and developers working to build the future of money.

We accept payments using Bitcoin Cash and Bitcoin. All are welcome!

Buy Now  

For bulk tickets please contact us at tickets@satoshisvisionconference.com

Master of Ceremonies We are pleased to announce that Taariq Lewis will be Master of Ceremonies for Satoshi's Vision Conference.

Taariq Lewis
CEO and founder,
Aquila
Taariq Lewis is the CEO and founder of Aquila. Since 2013, he has launched a number of successful Fintech and blockchain businesses and has helped bring Bitcoin and blockchain engineering to a global audience. He is a critical fixture of the Silicon Valley bitcoin and blockchain engineering community. Taariq has hosted the largest cryptocurrency and blockchain events including, Consensys 2017 (New York) and Scaling Bitcoin 2016 (Montreal).

Speakers We're pleased to announce this initial group of speakers for the conference

Roger Ver
CEO of Bitcoin.com

Keynote Speaker

Bitcoin’s usefulness as a store of value comes as a secondary effect from its usefulness as a medium of exchange. If you destroy the medium of exchange, you destroy the store of value." Roger Ver
CEO of Bitcoin.com , Bitcoin Investor

Developing the Protocol

Amaury Séchet
Lead Developer,
Bitcoin ABC

Bitcoin Unlimited

We are pleased to announce more speakers! Speakers at the conference represent a wide variety of backgrounds and expertise including:
  • • Academic Research
  • • Business
  • • Bitcoin Cash Community and Adoption
  • • Investment and Economic Theory
  • • Technical Development.

Vinny Lingham
Co-founder and CEO,
Civic

Featured Speaker

The gold market (Store of Value) is estimated at $7 trillion and the currency market (Medium of Exchange) is over $100 trillion. Both Bitcoin Cash & Bitcoin want to rule both. The question is how and in what context can both co-exist, as the crypto market will not benefit from a zero-sum game here, but rather from a win-win scenario, where both coins will find their ideal use case and scale massively." Vinny Lingham
Daniel Krawisz

A Message from the Conference Chair

On behalf of Bitcoin Unlimited, I would like to welcome you to Tokyo for Satoshi's Vision Conference. The speakers and attendees at this conference are thinkers and doers. Not only is their work groundbreaking and innovative, it is also directed towards an important goal: building the future of money. By working to create sound money the whole world can use, we will bring Satoshi's Vision to reality." Antony Zegers
